mapper.select: select u.user_id as userId, u.name as name, u.username as username, u.nickname as nickname, u.mobile as mobile, u.user_mileage as userMileage, upi.profile_image_url as profileImage, ug.grade_name as gradeName from users u left join user_profile_images upi on u.user_id = upi.user_id left join user_grades ug on u.user_id = ug.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}

select u.user_id as userId, u.name as name, u.username as username, u.nickname as nickname, u.email as email, u.user_mileage as userMileage, upi.profile_image_url as profileImage, ug.grade_name as gradeName from users u left join user_profile_images upi on u.user_id = upi.user_id left join user_grades ug on u.user_id = ug.user_id where u.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
